entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C

Observed at: Three Hills 12:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

Humidity: 93 %
